Interface Carnivorous

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlphaWolf, Bear, Wolf
public interface Carnivorous
Interface defining the behavior of carnivorous animals in the simulation. This interface provides default implementations for common carnivorous behaviors

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    eatCarcass(Carcass carcass)
    takes Nutritional value away from Carcass and gives it as energy.
    default void
    engageInCombat(Animal opponent)
    Handles combat behavior when encountering another carnivore.
    default void
    findFood()
    Searches for carcasses or hunts for prey if no carcasses are available.
    default ArrayList<itumulator.world.Location>
    findPrey()
    Identifies nearby prey within the carnivore's vision range.
    default void
    hunting()
    Moves towards nearest prey.
    default <T> Boolean
    isPrey(T type, ArrayList<String> preferedPrey)
    Checks if an object is a prey
    default void
    kill(Animal prey)
    Kills the prey, removing it from the simulation world.

  • Method Details

    • kill

      default void kill(Animal prey)
      Kills the prey, removing it from the simulation world.
      Parameters:
      prey - The prey to kill

    • isPrey

      default <T> Boolean isPrey(T type, ArrayList<String> preferedPrey)
      Checks if an object is a prey
      Parameters:
      animal - object to check if prey
      Returns:
      Returns true if object is in prefered prey list

    • findPrey

      default ArrayList<itumulator.world.Location> findPrey()
      Identifies nearby prey within the carnivore's vision range.
      Returns:
      A list of locations where prey is found.

    • hunting

      default void hunting()
      Moves towards nearest prey. If they are within range, kill them instead. If there is no prey, wander

    • findFood

      default void findFood()
      Searches for carcasses or hunts for prey if no carcasses are available.

    • eatCarcass

      default void eatCarcass(Carcass carcass)
      takes Nutritional value away from Carcass and gives it as energy.
      Parameters:
      carcass - Carcass to be eaten from

    • engageInCombat

      default void engageInCombat(Animal opponent)
      Handles combat behavior when encountering another carnivore.
      Parameters:
      opponent - The other carnivore to fight.
